title: 2025 Dutch Grand Prix start time: how to watch, live stream, F1 schedule and weather
summary: With the summer break now over, Formula 1 returns to the iconic Circuit Zandvoort for the 2025 Dutch Grand Prix, a crucial race in the heart of the championship battle

qa_pairs.question: Which circuit hosts the Dutch Grand Prix?
What is the significance of the Dutch Grand Prix in the F1 season?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is a crucial race in the heart of the championship battle.
wrong_options: It determines the pole position for the next race.

qa_pairs.question: When does the summer break in Formula 1 typically end?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: After the summer break, races resume, such as the Dutch Grand Prix.
